title: Airplane Practice Model
description: Interactive 3D preview of a cleaned airplane assembly. Use mouse or touch to orbit and zoom.

title: C-Bond Composite Panels
description: CFRP plates with honeycomb core for damage tolerance and repair efficiency studies; collaboration with Comtek & L3Harris, analysis by Bombardier & McGill.

title: Plant Simulation — Throughput Optimization
description: Simcenter/Plant Simulation model to explore buffer strategies and increase daily throughput on a production line.

title: CFD ANSYS Simulations
description: 2D/3D CFD exercises to study flow patterns, pressure fields and wake behavior around simple geometries.

title: Proximity Sensor (Arduino)
description: Small proximity sensor prototype with visual (LED) and acoustic (buzzer) alerts developed for an avionics course.
